recipe_name: Sweet plum bruschetta with cinnamon cream
author: Lesley Waters
method: Preheat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 4. Spread the bread with half of the butter, and lay the plum slices on top. Sprinkle over the brown sugar, dot with the remaining butter and place on a baking tray in the oven for 4-5 minutes, or until the butter is melted and bubbling. Serve the plum bruschetta with the cream and a dusting of icing sugar and cinnamon.
ingredients: 1 slice white bread,  25g/1oz buter,  1 plum, sliced,  1 tbsp brown sugar,  200ml/7fl oz double cream, whipped to soft peaks,  icing sugar, to dust,  pinch cinnamon
